mapper.select: SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,dy.delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_member um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_userid = #{userId} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 1 ORDER BY r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,dy.delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_coach um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_userid = #{userId} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 2 ORDER BY r_createtime DESC
SELECT dy.r_praise FROM dmd_dynamic dy WHERE dy.r_id = #{id}
SELECT dy.r_share_num FROM dmd_dynamic dy WHERE dy.r_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE dmd_dynamic SET r_praise = r_praise + 1 where r_id = #{id}
UPDATE dmd_dynamic SET r_praise = r_praise - 1 where r_id = #{id} and r_praise > 0
UPDATE dmd_dynamic SET r_share_num = r_share_num + 1 where r_id = #{id}
UPDATE dmd_dynamic SET delflag = 1 WHERE r_id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_member um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_topicid = #{value} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 1 ORDER BY r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_member um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_topicid = #{value} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 1 ORDER BY r_praise DESC , r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_coach um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_topicid = #{value} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 2 ORDER BY r_praise DESC , r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_member um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_id = #{value} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 1

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_coach um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_id = #{value} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 2

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait ,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_coach um on dy.r_userid = um.id WHERE dy.r_id = #{value} AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dmd_dynamic( r_author, r_head_portrait, r_content, r_createtime, r_address, r_picture, r_praise, r_share_num, r_comment_num, r_userid, r_topicid, width, height, delflag, user_type ) VALUES ( #{dynamicAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicHeadPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dynamicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicPraise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dynamicSharenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dynamicCommentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{width,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dmd_dynamic SET r_comment_num = r_comment_num + 1 where r_id = #{value}
UPDATE dmd_dynamic SET r_comment_num = r_comment_num - 1 where r_id = #{value} and r_comment_num > 0
mapper.select: SELECT dy.r_id,dy.r_picture,r_author,r_head_portrait,r_praise,r_userid,dy.height,dy.width,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id WHERE delflag = 0 AND dy.r_picture is not null ORDER BY r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,dy.r_picture,r_author,r_head_portrait,r_praise,dy.height,dy.width,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id WHERE delflag = 0 AND dy.r_picture is not null ORDER BY r_praise DESC , r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_member um on dy.r_userid = um.id
AND dy.r_content LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{content}),'%')
AND dy.delflag = 0 AND dy.user_type = 1
ORDER BY dy.r_createtime DESC

SELECT dy.r_id,um.nick_name AS r_author,um.icon AS r_head_portrait,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dt.topicName as r_topicName,delflag,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy LEFT JOIN dmd_dynamic_topic dt ON dy.r_topicid = dt.id LEFT JOIN ums_coach um on dy.r_userid = um.id
AND dy.r_content LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{content}),'%')
AND delflag = 0 AND user_type = 2
ORDER BY r_createtime DESC

INSERT INTO dmd_dynamic_praise_status( user_id, dynamic_id, status, user_type, dynamic_type )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{dynamicId}, 0, 2, 1 )
INSERT INTO dmd_dynamic_praise_status( user_id, dynamic_id, status, user_type, dynamic_type )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{dynamicId}, 0, 1, 2 )
INSERT INTO dmd_dynamic_praise_status( user_id, dynamic_id, status, user_type, dynamic_type )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{dynamicId}, 0, 2, 2 )

UPDATE dmd_dynamic_praise_status SET status = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dynamic_id = #{dynamicId} AND user_type = 2 AND dynamic_type = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dmd_dynamic_praise_status WHERE user_id = #{userId} and dynamic_id = #{dynamicId} and status = 0 and user_type = 1 and dynamic_type = 1
SELECT count(1) from dmd_dynamic_praise_status WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dynamic_id = #{id} AND user_type = 1 AND dynamic_type = 1

SELECT dy.r_id,dy.r_author,dy.r_head_portrait,dy.r_content,dy.r_createtime,dy.r_address,dy.r_picture,dy.r_praise,dy.r_share_num,dy.r_comment_num,dy.r_userid,dy.r_topicid,dy.user_type FROM dmd_dynamic dy where dy.r_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE dmd_dynamic_praise_status SET status = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dynamic_id = #{id} AND user_type = 1 AND dynamic_type = 1
UPDATE dmd_dynamic_praise_status SET status = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dynamic_id = #{id} AND user_type = 1 AND dynamic_type = 2
UPDATE dmd_dynamic_praise_status SET status = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dynamic_id = #{id} AND user_type = 2 AND dynamic_type = 1
UPDATE dmd_dynamic_praise_status SET status = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND dynamic_id = #{id} AND user_type = 2 AND dynamic_type = 2
mapper.select: SELECT r_userid as userId, DATE_FORMAT( r_createtime, '%Y%m' ) as months , r_picture as picture FROM dmd_dynamic WHERE r_userid = #{userId} AND ( r_picture <> NULL OR r_picture <> "" ) AND user_type = 1 AND delflag = 0 GROUP BY months ORDER BY months DESC

SELECT r_userid as userId, DATE_FORMAT( r_createtime, '%Y%m' ) as months , r_picture as picture FROM dmd_dynamic WHERE r_userid = #{userId} AND ( r_picture <> NULL OR r_picture <> "" ) AND user_type = 2 AND delflag = 0 GROUP BY months ORDER BY months DESC

SELECT r_picture AS picture FROM dmd_dynamic WHERE date_format(r_createtime, '%Y%m') = #{months} and r_userid = #{userId} and r_picture is not null and r_picture <> "" and user_type = 1 and delflag = 0 GROUP BY r_createtime DESC

SELECT r_picture AS picture FROM dmd_dynamic WHERE date_format(r_createtime, '%Y%m') = #{months} and r_userid = #{userId} and r_picture is not null and r_picture <> "" and user_type = 2 AND delflag = 0 GROUP BY r_createtime DESC
SELECT id,member_level_id,nick_name,icon,pics,personalized_signature FROM ums_member WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT id,nick_name,icon,personal_album as pics ,personal_profile as personalized_signature ,coach_grade AS member_level_id FROM ums_coach WHERE id = #{userId}
